      • readRows

        public static int readRows(java.util.Scanner input)
        Returns the number of rows retrieved by the user's input.
        • If the number of rows is less than 1, the user must reenter the number of rows until it is greater than 0.
        Parameters:
        input - simple text scanner used to parse the number of rows
        Returns:
        the number of rows

      • readCols

        public static int readCols(java.util.Scanner input)
        Returns the number of columns retrieved by the user's input.
        • If the number of columns is less than 1, the user must reenter the number of columns until it is greater than 0.
        Parameters:
        input - simple text scanner used to parse the number of columns
        Returns:
        the number of columns

      • readValues

        public static int[][] readValues(int rows,
                                 int cols,
                                 java.util.Scanner input)
        Returns the integer two-dimensional array of integers retrieved by the user's input given the integer arguments.
        • If the number of rows or columns is less than 1, the array will default to having one row and column with an element of 0.
        Parameters:
        rows - the number of rows for the array
        cols - the number of columns for the array
        input - simple text scanner used to parse the integers into the array
        Returns:
        the array of integer values

      • isConsecutiveFour

        public static boolean isConsecutiveFour(int[][] values)
        Returns if the integer two-dimensional array argument contains four consecutive integers with the same value, either horizontally, vertically, or diagonally.
        • If the array argument is a jagged array, it will default to not containing four consecutive integers with the same value.
        Parameters:
        values - array of group of integers
        Returns:
        true if the array contains four consecutive integers with the same value, either horizontally, vertically, or diagonally. Otherwise, false.

      • isMatrix

        public static boolean isMatrix(int[][] matrix)
        Returns if the integer two-dimensional array argument is a matrix.
        Parameters:
        matrix - array of integer values in a matrix
        Returns:
        true if the argument is a matrix. Otherwise, false.
